value: Write a function named check_numbers which will take two numbers and check if both are even prints “Both are even” else prints “Both are not even”.

title: solution
value:
function check_numbers(num1,num2){
if(num1%2 ===0 && num2%2===0){
console.log("Both are Even");
}
else{
console.log("Both are not Even");
}
}
